title: The Sponge: The Great Black Hole of the Shroudie Blogosphere
post:
We did not know if what happens in a black hole stays in a black hole. Stephen Hawking believes it could be a passage to other universes and he wouldn’t go in although he likes space flights.
Shroudstory com. is not a black hole because ideas and insights go in and do indeed re-appear in the minds of readers, who can make their own contributions and can even become “Shroudies” if they want to.
author: Louis

title: The Sponge: The Great Black Hole of the Shroudie Blogosphere
post:
In my opinion Dan’s blog is attractive like an interesting
Widmanstatten texture … and now Colin’s Planet is near
a flaming fireball…
Sorry.
I tried to turn myself in a sort of “old science fiction hunter”
and therefore I cannot find an useful link with
new possible Moon formation
pathway, etched with acids, on rocks…
Perhaps (… here only irony) Colin’s orbit around this blog
in the past may have been elliptical to varying degrees,
becoming more circular during periods of low tides
like at present.
Shroudstory com. is not a black stone!
